ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,John Buscema,John Forte,Paul Reinman,John Buscema,John Forte,Paul Reinman,Ogden Whitney
ComicInfo.Title: Legend of the Clock!; The House of Tomorrow!; Somewhere I'll Find You!; Strange Journey
ComicInfo.Summary:
Saturnian furniture is mistaken for Bob Carter's designs, but the futuristic furniture gets better reviews than his traditional work.
Professor Bordoni's experimental car takes him to another dimension, from which he is banished as a mental case...back to Earth!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Duke De Bascon,Monsieur Lechat,Gary,Marquis Duchamps,Rene,Mr. Janero,Aline
ComicInfo.Writer: Jonathan Burns,Shane O'Shea,Bob Standish,Thomas R. Drew,Jonathan Burns,Shane O'Shea,Bob Standish,Thomas R. Drew
